channel.title: Html on Ordinary Tech Chronicle
channel.description: Recent content in Html on Ordinary Tech Chronicle

item.title: Speech Tasks : a voice driven todo webapp
item.description: With the Web Speech Api, some good javascript libs and several lines of code, you can easily add speech recognition in your web application. All is done thanks to AnnYang JS lib made by Tal Ater, plumbing with Angular Light by Oleg Nechaev and served by a Go http server. (By the way, I love opensource community !) Try the demo ! See the code ! And thanks to Mark McGranaghan for his tutorial to deploy go app on Heroku

item.title: Video background [EN]
item.description: Forget large background image for your web site. Now, comes video time. So you want to put a nice video as background of your site but don’t know how to do ? “Fear you must not” said Yoda as it’s really simple. First, have a look at the effect in action. Nice, isn’t it ? First thing first, the html : <video src="your-video.mp4"></video> <div> your fantastic text here </div> Now, the css magic :
